mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_footprint (creator_id, province_id, title, start_date, end_date, create_time) VALUES (#{creatorId}, #{provinceId}, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, NOW())
INSERT INTO footprint_collaborator (footprint_id, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{footprintId}, #{userId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO footprint_photo (footprint_id, uploader_id, image_url, create_time) VALUES (#{footprintId}, #{uploaderId}, #{imageUrl}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.creator_id, f.province_id, f.title, f.start_date, f.end_date, f.create_time, u.username as creatorUsername, p.name as provinceName FROM travel_footprint f LEFT JOIN users u ON f.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN province p ON f.province_id = p.id WHERE f.id = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT f.id, f.creator_id, f.province_id, f.title, f.start_date, f.end_date, f.create_time, u.username as creatorUsername, p.name as provinceName FROM travel_footprint f JOIN footprint_collaborator c ON f.id = c.footprint_id LEFT JOIN users u ON f.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN province p ON f.province_id = p.id WHERE f.province_id = #{provinceId} AND c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.create_time DESC

SELECT p.id, p.footprint_id, p.uploader_id, p.image_url, p.create_time, u.username as uploaderUsername FROM footprint_photo p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.uploader_id = u.id WHERE p.footprint_id = #{footprintId} ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
SELECT p.id, p.footprint_id, p.uploader_id, p.image_url, p.create_time, u.username as uploaderUsername FROM footprint_photo p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.uploader_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT c.id, c.footprint_id, c.user_id, c.create_time, u.username FROM footprint_collaborator c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.footprint_id = #{footprintId}
